Reference Sentence: Розендейл, член на крайнодесния партиен актив Freedom Caucus, беше един от онези членове, които попречиха на гласуванията в сряда. Той счита числото от сделката на Джонсън за твърде голямо и недостатъчно, за да намали националния дълг, възлизащ на 34 трилиона щатски долара.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now.How are you doing, Callum?How is it going?Yah, all good.Good, yourself?Yah, I'm very good.Thank you.It's a privilege to talk to you because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023.So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Reference Sentence: Квартетът The Now от Южен Уелс с гордост издадоха своя дебютен албум, Too Hot To Handle, чрез True Music и Калъм е при мен сега. Как си, Калъм? Как върви? Всичко е наред. Добре ли си? Да, много съм добре, благодаря. За мен е привилегия да разговарям с теб, защото слушам вашата музика доста от 2023 година насам. Много ми харесва музиката и мисля, че е нещо, което определено трябва да бъде в класациите в наши дни.

Pro Euronews řekl, že trh, kterému dominují mezinárodní pivovarnické konglomeráty, nemá smysl porovnávat s trhem, který je složený z převážně malých lokálních producentů.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Reference Sentence: Není to legrační? Až polovina pracovních sil je nadbytečná a my se nedokážeme oprostit od toho, abychom si navzájem ubližovali. Zrychlila jsem, Alův obchod byl za rohem a uvnitř mi bude dobře. Když jsem stála před jasně zářícím nápisem „Albornova zastavárna!“, pohledem za sebe jsem se ujistila, že mě už nikdo nepronásleduje. Pomalejšími kroky jsem vešla dovnitř – toto místo vypadalo spíše jako úkryt, protože Alborn často přijímal lidi, kteří byli zmutováni a do Paltrica se dostávali tajně. Otevřela jsem dveře a světla byla zhasnutá, což je divné – nebyl tam žádný Al. Žádní uprchlíci. Nic. Něco zde nesedělo.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.
Reference Sentence: Ivory fragte sich, ob – anders als beim letzten Versuch – tatsächlich Einlass gewährt werden würde. Ich habe immer noch blaue Flecken vom letzten Mal. Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, general secretary of the Committee Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers.
Reference Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, Generalsekretär des Europäischen Verbands der Weinindustrie, dem Comité Européen des Entreprises Vin, der ca. 7.000 Winzer in ganz Europa vertritt, winkt bei den Bedenken der Bierhersteller ab. Er sagte gegenüber Euronews, dass ein Markt, der von multinationalen Brau-Konglomeraten beherrscht wird, nicht mit einer Branche verglichen werden kann, die fast ausschließlich aus kleinen, inländischen Herstellern besteht.

Source Sentence: Judging by the state of our hospitals, the SNP's talk of recovery plans and action plans is simply that - talk, and dangerous talk at that. We must not allow incompetent politicians to lull us into complicity in the demise of that great British institution, the National Health Service.
Reference Sentence: Wenn wir uns den Zustand unserer Krankenhäuser einmal ansehen, handelt es sich beim Gerede der SNP von Sanierung und Aktionsplänen um nichts weiter als leere Versprechen – und zwar gefährliche leere Versprechen. Wir dürfen nicht zulassen, dass sich die Öffentlichkeit von inkompetenten Politikern dazu hinreißen lässt, den Niedergang unserer großen britischen Institution, dem NHS, mitzutragen.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Reference Sentence: Lustig eigentlich. Es ist nur noch die Hälfte der Menschheit übrig und trotzdem hören wir nicht auf, uns gegenseitig die Köpfe einzuschlagen. Ich ging schneller, das Pfandhaus war direkt um die Ecke und drinnen war ich sicher. Als ich vor einem hell erleuchteten Schild mit der Aufschrift „Alborns Pfandhaus“ stand, bestätigte mir ein kurzer Blick über die Schulter, dass ich nicht mehr verfolgt wurde. Mit wieder ruhigerem Schritt betrat ich den Laden. Dieser Ort war eher abseits des Radars, da Alborn häufig Mutanten bei sich aufnahm, die sich unerlaubterweise in Paltricus aufhielten. Im Laden war es dunkel und Al war komischerweise auch nicht da. Keine Flüchtlinge. Nichts. Irgendetwas stimmte hier nicht.

I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.

Reference Sentence: Also, mein Vater kann mich nicht zur Arbeit bringen. Und ich muss ungefähr 27 Meilen zur Arbeit fahren. Hin und zurück wären das beinahe hundert Dollar pro Tag mit Uber. Ich habe noch nicht bei Lyft geschaut. Das hätte ich tun können, das macht Sinn. Aber bei meiner Autoversicherung ist Mieten nicht dabei, das ist also meine Schuld. Source Sentence: Rosendale, a member of the hard-right Freedom Caucus, was one of the individuals who derailed the Wednesday votes. He views the top line number in Johnson's deal as being too high and as doing too little to cut the $34 trillion national debt.
Translation: Rosendale, a hard-right Freedom Caucus, was one of the individuals who derailed the Wednesday votes. he sees the top line number in Johnson's deal as being too high and as as being doing too little to cut the $34 trillion national debt.
Reference Sentence: Rosendale, der dem ultrarechten Freedom Caucus angehört, war einer derjenigen, die am Mittwoch die Abstimmung scheitern ließen. Er hält den Gesamtbetrag in Johnsons Vorschlag für zu hoch und sieht ihn als nicht ausreichend an, um die Staatsverschuldung von 34 Billionen Dollar zu senken.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now.How are you doing, Callum?How is it going?Yah, all good.Good, yourself?Yah, I'm very good.Thank you.It's a privilege to talk to you because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023.So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Reference Sentence: Die vierköpfige Band The Now aus Südwales freut sich auf ihr erstes Album, Too Hot To Handle, bei True Music, und Callum ist jetzt bei mir. Wie gehts, Callum? Wie läuft es so? Ja, alles gut. Bei dir auch? Ja, bei mir ist alles bestens. Vielen Dank. Es ist mir eine Ehre, mit euch zu sprechen, denn seit 2023 habe ich eure Musik ganz oft gehört. Ich liebe diese Musik, und ich finde, sie ist etwas, was wir heutzutage in den Hitparaden definitiv brauchen können.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.
Reference Sentence: Die Ergebnisse sind da und – Trommelwirbel, bitte – sie stimmen völlig mit meiner Familiengeschichte überein. 89,9 % britisch und irisch, das meiste davon konzentriert auf die Gegend der Scottish Borders, aufs westliche Irland, Wales und Cornwall. Es ist allerdings nicht viel Bretonisches dabei, möglicherweise weil es entweder so nah an Cornwall dran ist, dass es sich bei mir nicht unterscheiden lässt, oder mein bretonischer Familienanteil stammt nicht von dort.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Reference Sentence: C'est drôle, n'est-ce-pas ? Nous ne sommes plus que la moitié en effectif, et nous ne pouvons pas nous empêcher de nous blesser les uns les autres. J'accélérai le pas, Al était juste au coin, je serais en sécurité à l'intérieur. Un regard derrière moi confirma que je n'étais plus suivie, tandis que je me tenais devant une enseigne lumineuse qui disait : "Dépôt-vente d'Alborn" ! Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Reference Sentence: Czyż to nie jest śmieszne? Dysponujemy tylko połową zasobów ludzkich i nie potrafimy nawet zaniechać wyrządzania sobie krzywdy. Bezzwłocznie przyspieszyłam kroku, lokal Ala znajdował się za zakrętem, a wewnątrz będę bezpieczna. Obejrzawszy się za siebie, uświadomiłam sobie, że nikt już za mną nie idzie. Stałam przed rozświetlonym szyldem, na którym widniał napis: „Lombard Alborna!”. Idąc już wolniej, weszłam do środka ponownie – ten lokal dział raczej pod przykrywką, gdyż Alborn regularnie gościł ludzi po przejściu mutacji, którzy przekradli się na teren Paltricusa. Jak tylko otworzyłam drzwi, światła zgasły, co ciekawe – Ala tam nie było. Zero uchodźców. Nikogo. Wydarzyło się tu coś niedobrego.

Source Sentence: So my dad can't give me rides to work. And for me, work is about 27 miles away. So there and back would be nearly a $100 a day with Uber. I haven't looked at Lyft. I could have, I guess, that makes sense. But I didn't have rental on my auto insurance, so that's my fault. So I guess I could have tried to do that and get that set up and tried to get a rental while I was down and out of a car. But even then, a rental wouldn't cover seven days. I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.

Reference Sentence: Czyli tata nie może zawozić mnie do pracy. A miejsce mojej pracy znajduje się w odległości jakichś 27 mil. Zatem kurs tam i z powrotem Uberem może kosztować około 100 dolarów na dzień. Nie sprawdzałam na Lyft. Powinnam była to zrobić, bo to może być sensowna opcja. Aczkolwiek moje ubezpieczenie samochodowe nie obejmowało opcji wynajmu, więc sama jestem sobie winna. Przypuszczam, że mogłam spróbować zająć się tym, załatwić wszystkie formalności i wypożyczyć auto, kiedy to przechodziłam gorszy okres i byłam bez samochodu. Jednak nawet wówczas wynajem nie pokrywałby całego tygodnia. Czekaj, bo za moment kichnę. Co za słabe kichnięcie.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now.How are you doing, Callum?How is it going?Yah, all good.Good, yourself?Yah, I'm very good.Thank you.It's a privilege to talk to you because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023.So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Reference Sentence: The Now, zespół w czteroosobowym składzie z południowej Walii, ma zaszczyt ogłosić wydanie swojego debiutanckiego albumu „Too Hot To Handle” w ramach projektu True Music. W tym momencie dołącza do mnie Callum. Co u ciebie, Callum? Co słychać? Tak, wszystko w porządku. U ciebie dobrze? Tak, mam się doskonale. Dzięki. To zaszczyt móc z tobą rozmawiać, gdyż jestem wiernym fanem waszej muzyki od 2023 roku. Ja najzwyczajniej uwielbiam tę muzykę i uważam, że bez wątpienia zasługujemy na taki rodzaj muzyki na współczesnych listach przebojów.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Reference Sentence: Nu că este amuzant? Mai avem jumătate din populație și nu ne putem abține de la a ne face rău unii celorlalți. Grăbesc pasul, magazinul lui Al era chiar după colț, deci ar trebui să fie în regulă înăuntru. Când mă aflam în fața semnului strălucitor pe care scria „Amanetul lui Alborn”, am aruncat o privire în spatele meu pentru a mă asigura că nu mai sunt urmărită. Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.

Aceleyle hızlandım, Al'in dükkanı köşeyi dönünce karşıma çıkacaktı, içeri girince güvende olurdum. Arkama bir bakış attım, "Alborn'un Rehinci Dükkanı!" yazan parlak, parlayan bir tabelanın önünde dururken artık takip edilmediğimden emin oldum. Daha yavaş adımlarla içeri girdim - burası daha tenhaydı, çünkü Alborn genellikle mutasyona uğramış ve Paltricus'a gizlice girmiş insanları içeri alırdı. Kapıyı açtığımda, ilginç bir şekilde ışıklar kapatılmıştı. Al yoktu. Mülteciler yoktu. Hiçbir şey yoktu. Burada ters giden birşeyler vardı.
